thread.title: Bank offers £25,000 reward for information after robbery
thread.title_full: Bank offers £25,000 reward for information after robbery | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bank offers £25,000 reward for information after robbery
text:
A sign in the window of Lloyds Bank on Cowbridge Road East, Cardiff, is offering a £25,000 reward for information. Credit: Garan Thomas A bank in Cardiff is offering a £25,000 reward, after a robbery this afternoon.
Armed police were called to Lloyds Bank on Cowbridge Road East at around 4pm, following reports of an incident. A sign has been put up in the branch offering the reward for any information about the robbery.
South Wales Police confirmed officers had attended an incident and investigations are ongoing
Last updated Mon 13 Feb 2017 Read more 2 updates Bank offers reward for information after robbery at Cardiff branch Wales Cardiff
